Pretty good FPS shooting game.
A fucking lot of cheaters.
When you get cheater to your game you can just leave but you will get a fucking competetive cooldown wich is so idiot cuz you literally need to fuckin play with cheaters and you get punished.
A lot of cool skins and expensive skins such as knife skins or really rare skins.
I think its 7/10
